projects.title: VSDSquadron
projects.description: The VSDSquadron is a development board designed to make learning RISC V and VLSI accessible . It's been a pleasure to make VSDSquadron scalable without compromising ease of use or convenience, with my main focus being on optimizing the production files and BOM.

projects.title: Seraphim: Autonomous Hexrotor
projects.description: Seraphim is an autonomous, six feet wide hexrotor designed at ProjectMANAS. Capable of autonomous navigation, image detection and payload delivery, it was our entry to the 2022 AUVSI SUAS Challenge held in Maryland USA.
